name: Dream Pictures
des: This is a wedding photography service providing website. Currently here some services are added and authentication system implemented. User can login/signup using google authentication also email, password based authentication system is implemented.
tech: HTML, CSS, React Js, React Bootstrap, React Router, Firebase Authentication

name: Electro Point
des: This is an Inventory Management website. This inventory management system is related to laptop items. Here different suppliers can manage their products. where users can Login/registration by google authentication/ Email, Password. We have option to add inventory item, delete inventory item, update quantity of item
tech: Html, CSS, Bootstrap, React js, Node js, Express js, MongoDB, Firebase and we have used icons from heroicon.

name: BD Tool
des: This is a Manufacturer website where users can Login/registration by google authentication & User name, Email, Password, User & Admin Role separated Dashboard. Add products, manage all orders & Manage all Products & delete orders/ products, upgrade and user to admin by Admin. Users can order products, add a review, View My orders and also delete them. Payment system is implemented using stripe.
tech: HTML, CSS, Tailwind CSS, Daisy UI, React js, Node js, Express js, MongoDB, Firebase

name: Avix Pharmaceuticals
des: This is a commercial project. As a web developer of Avix Pharmaceuticals Limited I developed the entire website. This website is fully responsive. It has only client side. For few dynamic data we didn't maintained a databse. Such as for the team members, news and events section we have used json file to keep our dynamic data. Here is a pipeline section. Which is also dynamic.
tech: Html, CSS, Bootstrap, React js, react router, react helmet, AOS animation, Email js, Lazy Loading, slick slider, and we have used icons from fontawesome.

name: Amenar Alo
des: This is a charity website. here we have focused on child education. It has a nice dashboard with a lot of features. Such as own profile management, manage users, add user, delete user, view user, promote volunteer to moderator, add childrens, remove childrens, add results of childrens.
tech: HTML, CSS, Tailwind CSS, Daisy UI, React js, Node js, Express js, MongoDB, Firebase, react helmet, lazy loading, slick slider, email js, fontawesome
